bour.camus.gameofgooses.models

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • bour.camus.gameofgooses.models.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    The Board class represents the board of the Game. It contains all the ICell used to play.
    Author:
    Armand BOUR, Tristan CAMUS

    • Field Summary

    • Field Detail

      • mCells

        private ICell[] mCells
        Array containing all the cells of the board.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board(java.lang.String filename)
        Constructor using a .txt file as a model to create the board. You don't need to specify the first and final cell in the file.
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename of the model to use. See board.txt for an example.
        • 0 is a NormalCell ;
        • 1 is a GooseCell ;
        • 2 is a TrapCell ;
        • 3 is a WaitCell, followed by the number of turns to wait (ex: 3,2) ;
        • 4 is a TeleportCell, followed by the index of the cell to teleport to (ex: 4,2).

    • Method Detail

      • normalise

        public int normalise(int index)
        Normalise the specified index to make sure it doesn't exceed the size of the board.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the cell to normalise.
        Returns:
        the normalised index

        Returns:
        the cell at the specified index

        public int getSize()
        Gets the number of cells in the Board.
